name: Will Dill
text: I haven't had papa John's since they gave away free pizza during the super bowl years ago.  At first I thought they forget to put the toppings on the pizza but it seems that they put the cheese on TOP of the toppings.  That's very unique. ‚Ä¶More

text: Honestly the place is delicious but the service tonight was gutter trash. Staff tonight consisted of 2 girls and 1 guy and the 2 girls were more concerned about having a conversation than fixing the food. The guy was outstanding though, he ‚Ä¶More

name: The Know
text: The WORST pizza, EVER! DISGUSTING! Moreover, the moron driver didn't have change when I specifically told the man answering the phone that the driver must have change for $20.00. Thank God my roommates had the exact change and paid him. He ‚Ä¶More

name: Carr'Motorcity Towing inc. William Carr
text: Great place Carr's MotorCity Towing Inc loves them

name: Quinn Renay
text:
Great service!!! Called in my order, very professional!!! Once arrived to pick up my pizza, the service amazing.
Pizza was great....thin crust with bacon, onion and chicken.
Thanks for a good experience, doesn't happen often.

name: Gina Perry
text: Chris the owner is amazing! Supports local non profit organizations. We contacted over 50+ pizza places to sponsor an up coming animal adoption events and he responded within minutes and was so willing to help! THANK YOU CHRIS üêæ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: E. B. Snodgrass
text: Have slices of pizza from 11:30-2:30 every day. Friendly service.

name: James Koenig
text: Unbelievably good service! Brian the manager hooked us up!! We went in to the sandwich shop next door, but we could hear them fountain change in the back and they said " be right there" after 5 minutes of waiting we decided to try papa John's. Glad we did. Good good excellent service!

name: kalenbasheera lee
text:
I asked for light cheese in my online order and they are always careless and just do what they want to your pizza
They never do it how I ask

name: JSAdams Photography
text: I rarely encounter experiences that prompt me to write a review. But in cases of extreme ineptitude and rudeness, it's warranted. Just got a pizza from here. Sort of. I ordered one, sure. But when it showed up an hour and a half late (I ‚Ä¶More

name: ron woods
text: Gr8 service excellent ingredients very tasty pizza! It was my first time trying it and I was pleasantly surprised.

name: Alexander H. Trice
text: Pretty good Groupon deal made catering a small group easy

name: Quality Care
text: Not all Papa John's are created equal my Midland Michigan my hometown when I order extra cheese I still get skimped this Papa John's while I was out of town I had good cheese when I took a slice of pizza I got cheese with it so good job guys you're not trying to skimp your bottom line for corporate

name: Paul Sievertson
text: Absolutely delicious pizza. Great experience overall. Must put above all, first driver that has ever found my house on the first try and was so polite and professional.!!!! Definitely my new favourite pizza place.

name: Shay The xtra
text: This pizza was ok I think maybe if the employees weren‚Äôt so into the Detroit pistons game it probably would have tasted better plus the staff not so friendly greenfield location

name: Anas Al-Humiari
text: Cheese Burger Pizza may sound weird but saved my life when I ate it! Delicious and fulfilling.

name: Erica Shields
text: Ordered while we were staying at a near by hotel. We dont have a papa John's near our home so we were excited. Placed an order online for carryout. They were out of ranch dressing which I guess no big deal unless you have an extremely picky ‚Ä¶More

name: Arii B
text:
This place is absolutely HORRIBLE   , the pizza is HORRIBLE turn around now , I go to the 6 mile location in Livonia
MUCH MUCH BETTER!!!!!

name: Darlette Ramsey
text: Order gluten free pizza. It's terrific

name: Kare Ntle
text: Carry out. Pizza crust edges were burnt. Pizza has no flavor even the sauce is bland. Better pizza Papa John's. I think not!!!

name: Polky Turner
text: Took over an hour and fifteen minutes to deliver pizza on a random Saturday afternoon. Out of nowhere they send us a card for a free pizza. Promo code said redeemable online only. Tried to use promo code online and it didn't even work. Customer service help was a joke.

name: Scott Miller
text: Buffalo chicken pizza came with NO buffalo sauce.  That aside, ugh.  Not the worst, but definitely the first and last time I order from this or any Papa John's.

name: playit forward
text: Jun18- Just got a pizza from there. The whole experience cost me $22. $17 for the papa johns, and $5 for the little Caesar‚Äôs after I couldn‚Äôt eat the papa johns. ‚Ä¶More

text: I ordered a pizza from papa John's tonight and when it was delivered it was folded in half. Our brownie was cold and the cheese on our cheese sticks was barely melted. NEVER EVER AGAIN WILL I ORDER FROM HEREüò†üò°
